# Math (ARCHIVED)

**Status:** DEPRECATED - Merged into `/research`
**Migration:** Use `/research methods` or `/research analysis` instead

---

This command has been archived as part of Phase 3 optimization.
Mathematical and statistical functionality is now part of the `/research` hub:
- `/research methods` - Statistical methods guidance
- `/research analysis` - Data analysis workflow
- `/research tables` - Generate tables with calculations

## Migration Guide

| Old Command | New Command |
|-------------|-------------|
| `/math` | `/research methods` |
| `/math stats` | `/research analysis` |
| `/math formula` | `/research methods` |
